description: Take list of primes, move left digit of each term to end of previous term.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a032759 n = a032759_list !! (n-1)a032759_list = 2 : map read (zipWith (++) vs (tail us)) :: [Integer]   where (us,vs) = unzip $ map ((splitAt 1) . show) a000040_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 10 2013
author: _Patrick De Geest_, May 15 1998
